quote: When people criticize me, instead of putting my head down, it gives me energy to do even more.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I decide my future. I decide what I want to do. Nobody else.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Some things is made by destiny, yes, other things by hard work, but quality you don’t learn. Quality you are born with.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Impossible is just an opinion.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
author: Joe Kennedy

quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them
author: Chris Gosser

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
author: Bobby Unser

quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
author: Bruce Feirstein

quote: Perfection is boring. Getting better is where all the fun is.
author: Dragos Roua

quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stow

quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
author: John Wooden

quote: The only person you should try to be better than, is the person you were yesterday.
author: Matty Mullens

quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals
author: Michael Korda

quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: You don’t drown by falling in water; you drown by staying there.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
author: Robert Schuller

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions
author: Stephen Covey

quote: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If your ship doesn’t come in, swim out to meet it.
author: Jonathan Winters

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing.
author: Philippos

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: If you genuinely want something, don't wait for it--teach yourself to be impatient.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.
author: Jane Smiley

quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.
author: Theodore N. Vail

quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
author: Washington Irving

quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Grey

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
author: Aristotle

quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
author: Confucius

quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
author: Epictetus

quote: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Show up, show up, show up, and after a while the muse shows up, too.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Small is not just a stepping-stone. Small is a great destination itself.
author: Jason Fried

quote: The only one who can tell you “you can’t win” is you and you don’t have to listen.
author: Jessica Ennis

quote: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you can't yet do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
author: Epicurus

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: If you don’t risk anything, you risk even more.
author: Erika Jong

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: You carry the passport to your own happiness.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
author: Drake

quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
author: Seneca

quote: Sometimes magic is just someone spending more time on something than anyone else might reasonably expect.
author: Raymond Joseph Teller

quote: It’s not the will to win that matters—everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters.
author: Paul Bryant

quote: True humility is not thinking less of yourself; it is thinking of yourself less.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.
author: Ruth Gordo

quote: More is lost by indecision than wrong decision.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there's still going to be somebody who hates peaches.
author: Dita Von Teese

quote: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: I think it’s intoxicating when somebody is so unapologetically who they are.
author: Don Cheadle

quote: I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.
author: Louise Hay

quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: No one changes the world who isn’t obsessed.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Hellen Keller

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.
author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

quote: If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day it usually is.
author: Catherine Pulsifier

quote: The only difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: If you work on something a little bit every day, you end up with something that is massive.
author: Kenneth Goldsmith

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Every champion was once a contender that didn’t give up.
author: Gabby Douglas

quote: The big lesson in life is never be scared of anyone or anything.
author: Frank Sinatra
